short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to pair with the Renomate web app to bring the Renomate experience with you as you shop!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The RenoMate Chrome extension is designed to bring the RenoMate experience with you as you browse the web. Users can quickly add items to their RenoMate selections lists without navigating back to the RenoMate app. As an added bonus, the extension is able to gather page information automatically reducing the number of user inputs!
